mapper.select: select no, title, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy') as year, to_char(sdate, 'mm') as month, to_char(sdate, 'dd') as day, time from schedule order by no desc, time asc
select no, title, year, month, day, time, content, writer from schedule where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(no, title, year, month, day, time, content, writer) values(board_seq.nextval,#{title},#{year},#{month},#{day},#{time},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: update schedule set title=#{title},year=#{year},month=#{month},day=#{day},time=#{time}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where no=#{no}
